heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny and still cool.  Highs in the 50s to around 60.  Winds light, becoming southwest near 10 mph, some gusts to 20 mph through the Champlain Valley and over the higher terrain.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear and not as cold.  Areas of frost.  Lows in the 30s, in the upper 20s in the cold spots north.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Mostly sunny and a bit milder.  Highs in the low to mid 60s.  Winds light, mainly south less than 10 mph.
